title: bajarE baja maanasa
sahitya:
bhajarE bhaja mAnasa rAmam   
(bhajarE)

anupallavi

ajamukha shuka vinutam shubha caritam   
(bhajarE)

caraNam 1

nirmita lOkam nirjita shOkam pAlita munijanam adhunA nrpa
pAkam   
(bhajarE)

caraNam 2

shankara mitram shyAmaa gAtram kinkara jana gaNa
tApatraya tamOmitram  
(bhajarE)

caraNam 3

bhUsama shAntam bhuja kAntam vAram akhiladam
tyAgarAja hrdbhAntam   
(bhajarE)
